tasks.task: Explain the concept of farm for sustainable agricultural practices.
subtasks: Discuss the purpose of the project (maximizing land use, minimizing input costs, efficient resource utilization).
Describe the terrace farm including three types of crops (tea, sugar cane, corn, mustard) and explain soil conservation benefits.
Describe the pomological farm with multiple fruit types (oranges, guavas, mangoes, plums, watermelons) for diversified production.
Explain composting of domestic and agricultural waste to create manure, highlighting efficient waste management.
Describe the biogas system utilizing cow dung from poultry to provide fuel for household use, mentioning cost reduction.
Detail the solar panel setup converting solar energy into electrical power for lighting, reducing electricity expenses.
Outline rainwater harvesting from terraces to store runoff for irrigation, particularly in the paddy field and fishery.
Describe the integrated fishery within the rice field, benefiting both rice cultivation and fish production through water conservation.

tasks.task: Summarize the benefits of the sustainable practices, including reduced input costs and increased profits.
subtasks: Mention potential yield increase from 2-2.5 metric tons per year to higher levels with these practices.
Highlight land cultivation potential in Arunachal Pradesh by combining various practices.
Acknowledge consultations with agricultural officials and verified information sources for project viability.
